page.pg_title: Tasks to perform under the Wells/Sites Search tab

text_content.paragraph: Under the Wells/Sites tab, you have several options to search for wells and facilities, and to work with the search results. Two of the widely used features under this tab are the (??)Go to Contract(s)(%??)[##link=image##] and (??)Go to Lease(s)(%??)[##link=image##] options found in the Results Action dropdown list.

graphic.alt: Left: Graphic labeled Search Types: My Properties, Details, Location, Dates, Elevation/Depth, Team, A&D, Comments, Job, Production, Event Milestones. Right: Graphic labeled Search Results Interactions: Save a search, Add a property to My Properties, Graph Results, Request Files, Wellbore Schematic, Print Detailsâ€¦, Go to Contract(s), Go to Lease(s), Customize Search results, Excel Export, and Access wells/sites details

page.prompt: CLICK THE HIGHLIGHTED TEXT TO LEARN MORE. THEN CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: Under the Wells/Sites tab, you have several options to search for wells and facilities, and to work with the search results.
